title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
You can download the latest version of my CV here:
Download my CV



I am a graduate student with a strong foundation in data analytics, cloud computing, and systems/operations. My experience spans academic projects, real-world manufacturing environments, and cloud-based infrastructure labs. I enjoy working on problems where I can combine technical skills with business understanding.





Technical Skills: Python, SQL, R, data cleaning, feature engineering, model building, and visualization.
Cloud Skills: Hands-on work with AWS (VPC, EC2, S3, IAM, load balancer) and exposure to GCP.
Analytics & Reporting: Turning raw data into dashboards, reports, and recommendations for decision-makers.
Operations & Systems: Understanding of manufacturing workflows, supply-chain concepts, and process optimization.
Collaboration: Comfortable working in teams, documenting work clearly, and presenting findings.

For full details, including education, projects, and experience, please refer to the downloadable CV above.

title: Projects
text: Here is a selection of my academic and personal projects that highlight my skills in data, and systems.

title: Projects
section: Job Market Analytics – Skills & Role Prediction
text:
Job Market Analytics – Skills & Role Prediction
Tech: SQL, Python (pandas, scikit-learn), Jupyter/Quarto, Matplotlib/Seaborn

Analyzed a large job postings dataset to understand trends in skills, salaries, and role categories.
Engineered features and trained models such as Logistic Regression and Random Forest to classify job roles.
Evaluated performance using accuracy, F1-score, and AUC and compared models to select a final approach.
Created clear visualizations and a written report to communicate results to non-technical stakeholders.

What this demonstrates: End-to-end analytics workflow, model comparison, and storytelling with data.

title: Projects
text:
Personal Portfolio Website (This Site)
Tech: Quarto, HTML/CSS, Git, GitHub Pages

Designed and built a personal portfolio website using Quarto.
Organized pages into About, Projects, CV, and Contact to align with employer expectations.
Customized theme/colors and added a downloadable CV, external links, and visuals.
Deployed the site on GitHub Pages and set up a clean URL for sharing with recruiters.

What this demonstrates: Web publishing, documentation, and personal branding.

title: Projects
text:
Manufacturing & Operations Optimization (Family Business)
Tech: Excel, basic SQL, process mapping, SAP (concepts)

Worked on optimizing processes in a manufacturing/LED OEM context (materials, BOMs, and workflows).
Helped identify bottlenecks, improve visibility into shortages, and suggest process changes.
Used structured thinking and available data to support better decision-making.

What this demonstrates: Real-world operations experience, problem-solving, and ability to connect data with business outcomes.

title: Contact
text: I’m always open to connecting about roles, collaborations, or just discussing projects in data, cloud, and systems.

title: Contact
text:
How I Prefer to Connect

For recruiters and hiring managers – email or LinkedIn is best.
For technical questions or open-source work – GitHub or email works great.
I usually respond within a couple of days, depending on my class and project schedule.

title: About Me
text:
I am a graduate student focused on data analytics, cloud computing, and system design. I enjoy turning real-world problems into structured, data-driven solutions and building systems that actually work in production, not just on paper.
Over the past few years, I’ve worked across: - Manufacturing & operations – optimizing processes, reducing shortages, and automating workflows. - Data analytics & machine learning – building models, dashboards, and insights to support decisions.




Data analytics
Supply chain and operations optimization

Building real, usable tools for business teams






Programming & Data: Python, SQL, R, Pandas, scikit-learn

Analytics & Visualization: Tableau, Power BI, Excel

Methods & Practices: System analysis, project management, ETL pipelines,experimentation





My goal is to work in roles that sit at the intersection of data, systems, and business—such as:

Data / Business / Analytics Engineer

Cloud / Solutions Engineer

Operations & Systems Analyst

Long term, I want to design data and cloud platforms that help organizations make faster, smarter decisions and scale confidently.




Outside academics, I’m involved in: - Family business initiatives around manufacturing and LED/OEM products
- Hands-on experimentation with new tools, cloud platforms, and personal projects
- Learning, teaching, and mentoring peers in analytics and cloud topics
If you’d like to connect, head over to the Contact tab!
